Changelog
=========

1.0.2 (2012/09/10)
--------------------

- Fix batch url for 2nd and next pages
  [erral]

1.0.1 (2012/09/07)
-------------------

- One more check in baching
  [erral]

1.0 (2012/09/07)
-------------------

- Fix batches' base url with canonical urls
  [erral]

- Remove trailing / for the canonical urls, rely on the 
  default view (template or default page)
  [erral]

- Added <link rel="canonical" ...> tag for all pages. 
  [erral]

- Added meta noindex, follow tag for batch pages
  [erral]
